name: epiphytically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a plant grows epiphytically, it grows on another plant but does not feed from it: grow epiphytically Many orchids grow epiphytically high up in trees or on rocks. Some species are able to grow epiphytically on other trees. Related word
epiphytic
More examplesFewer examplesHe discovered the plant growing epiphytically in the mountain forests.The algae are usually found growing epiphytically on seaweed.This fern is sometimes found epiphytically growing in forked branches. Lichens are usually found living epiphytically on tree bark.The plant can only survive epiphytically on the leaves of host plants.
